name: Time Traveler - Escape Room VR
description:
An escape room game that will immerse you in the lives of some of the most iconic characters in history, including Leonardo da Vinci, Coco Chanel and Marie Curie

A unique and immersive experience that combines mystery, logic and a stimulating intellectual adventure. Set in a historical context, this game is designed to challenge your brain and sharpen your detective skills as you immerse yourself in the search for hidden facts about some of the most iconic figures in history.
